tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: London 2012 Paralympics - Goalball at the Copper Box Arena - GB vs Sweden
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: Footage of the third group games of the Goalball which sees Paralympic GB take on Sweden. The game ended as 3 - 3 and was GB's first points of the games. Not a brilliant spectator sport as you have to stay silent so the athletes can hear the ball but it turned out to be entertaining and interesting.

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: The is the hardest game I must have ever﻿ seen....Incredible
oh cool, yeah i thought it was brilliant, better than i thought it would be and it also looked really﻿ fun!!

We were in the crowd too watching this match. Having never heard of goalball before these﻿ games we were unsure what to make of it, however really enjoyed watching it. And there little phrases did have me giggling under my breathe 'Love it'
Been a great atmosphere in the copperbox! Loved watching this and there have been some pretty﻿ tense matches so far.

Reviewer.Movies: The Italian Job 69', Le Mans, Grand Prix, Smokey and the Bandit, Dukes of Hazard, Gone in 60 seconds
Reviewer.Music: Black Eyed Peas, AC/DC, Paramore, Rush, Spinal Tap
